items.title: Improvado: Unify 500+ Data Sources and Maximize Your ROAS with Automated Marketing Reporting
items.summary: Improvado aims to help marketing teams unify over 500 data sources and automate marketing reporting to maximize Return on Ad Spend (ROAS). This solution addresses the challenge of fragmented data, inconsistent reports, and delayed decision-making in marketing.

items.summary: The White House released a policy roadmap outlining President Trump's strategy to maintain U.S. leadership in AI, emphasizing deregulation, infrastructure development, export controls, and freedom.

items.title: Rewriting The Narrative Of Hurricane Katrina
items.summary: A new Nat Geo docuseries uses tech and survivor testimony to reframe Hurricane Katrina as a preventable digital-age failure, not just a natural disaster.

items.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Apple Mac review: an impressive, thoughtful port from CD Projekt RED
items.summary: Cyberpunk 2077 has been successfully ported to Apple Mac computers, offering ray tracing support and advanced MetalFX features. CD Projekt Red's release of the game for Apple Silicon Mac shows the potential for AI technology to enhance gaming experiences on different platforms.

items.title: Mistral’s new “environmental audit” shows how much AI is hurting the planet

items.summary: Invenergy's Grain Belt Express project will continue despite the U.S. Department of Energy's decision stating that federal involvement is not critical in the first phase.

items.title: Apple Adds 13, 16 and 18 Plus Age Ratings to Its Apps and Games: What to Know
items.summary: Apple has added 13, 16, and 18 plus age ratings to its apps and games to improve child safety measures. This move demonstrates a focus on ethics in ensuring appropriate content is easily identifiable for users of different age groups.

items.title: Driverless-truck tech: Owner-ops worry over cyberattacks, crashes, competition
items.summary: Nearly a fourth of owner-operator respondents to a recent poll expressed concerns about cyberattacks, crashes, and competition related to driverless-truck technology.

items.title: As AI becomes more popular, concerns grow over its effect on mental health
items.summary: As AI becomes more popular, concerns grow over its effect on mental health - Too much of anything is bad for you, including faux-magical statistical models. There are numerous recent reports of people becoming too engaged with AI, sometimes to the detriment of their mental health.

items.summary: Golfer Cam Starr achieved a one-in-a-trillion feat by scoring two albatrosses in one round in Las Vegas, a rare occurrence that has only happened once in a PGA Tour event. This remarkable accomplishment highlights the innovative skills and abilities of athletes in the field of golf.
